addMember(address,uint256,bool).details: Called by: Elections contract Notifies a new member applicable for committee (due to registration, unbanning, certification change)

getCommittee().details: Called by: Elections contract Returns the committee members and their weights

getCommitteeInfo().details: returns the current committee used also by the rewards and fees contracts

getSettings().details: returns the current settings of the committee contract

memberCertificationChange(address,bool).details: Called by: Elections contract Notifies a guardian certification change

memberWeightChange(address,uint256).details: Called by: Elections contract Notifies a weight change for sorting to a relevant committee member. weight = 0 indicates removal of the member from the committee (for exmaple on unregister, voteUnready, voteOut)

removeMember(address).details: Called by: Elections contract Notifies a a member removal for exampl	e due to voteOut / voteUnready

setContractRegistry(address).details: Updates the address calldata of the contract registry
